metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18651 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in functionID3_Support::ID3v2Frame::getFrameValue in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted audiofile with ID3V2 frame.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
libexempi8 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1').
